courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisites: ADV 283 and ADV 284.
description: Analyzes audiences and matches consumer insights with strategic ideas for brand communication, contact, and connection. 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisites: ADV 283 and ADV 284.
label: Audience Analysis
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Agr & Environmental Cmc & Educ or Advertising or Agricultural Communications major(s). Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
